errors.CAMP_SUBSCRIPTION_CLOSED: This drop campaign has already finished

rules.title: Rules
rules.rtp: Doesn't affect RTP of the game
rules.bet: All bets qualify unless a minimum bet is set
rules.goal: The higher the bet, the higher the chances of winning the prize
rules.max_wins_per_player: The number of prizes a single player can win in this campaign is limited to {value}.

details.title: All rules of Promo
details.description: The "{name}" promotion is available for this game and runs from {from} to {to} ("Promotion Deadline") or until all prizes have been drawn.
details.agreement: By participating in a promotion (as defined below), you hereby agree to abide by these terms and conditions.

summary.title: Promotion "{value}"
summary.total: The total amount of prizes is {value}.
summary.delay: Prize payouts may be delayed up to 72 hours.

conditions.title: How to take part in the "{value}" promotion
conditions.join: The player needs to join the promotion-related game.
conditions.spin: The player must make at least one spin.
conditions.bet: Any bet placed on any eligible game may result in a maximum of one random prize from the prize pool during the promotion period.
conditions.player: The number of prizes to win by one player is limited only by their number.
conditions.limit: The number of prizes a single player can win is limited only by the prize pool of the campaign.
conditions.free: Participation in the promotion will not carry any additional costs.

details.progressive: The progressive prize pool grows based on overall players activity within the drop campaign. Recalculation is performed daily. You can track it's dynamic in drop campaign details information

general.active_player: You are taking part in the promo!
general.passive_player: You took part in the promo!
general.limit_message: Spins limit reached. Further spins won't count

join.title: Paste your invitation code to join the challenge
join.join_balance_error: Balance is not enough to join

error.100: You are taking part in another challenge
error.default: Something went wrong. Please try again later

playerCode.title: Note
playerCode.message: Each participant is assigned a unique player ID. It may be useful if any questions arise during the challenge or for verifying your identity as a player.

rules.title: Rules
rules.fee: Participation fee is {value}. Fee will be taken from your balance when you join the challenge. The prize pool is formed from entry fees and is divided among the winners based on the results of the challenge in accordance with the settings
rules.goal_bets: The player with the highest total bets wins. Scoring rule: 1 point for every {value} bet
rules.goal_mult: The player with the highest sum of multipliers wins. The top {value} multipliers during the Challenge period are considered
rules.goal_sum: The player with the highest total sum of multipliers wins. All multipliers accumulated during the challenge period are counted
rules.winner: If players have equal top multipliers, then the one who gets it first - win
rules.winner_bets: If players have the same total bets, the one who reached it first wins
rules.winner_mult: If players have the same sum of multipliers, the winner is the one who achieved it first
rules.winner_sum: If players have the same total multiplier sum, the one who reaches it first wins
rules.id: Changing the currency will switch your player ID, and your challenge progress will be recorded separately for each player ID
rules.spin_denied: The features you have purchased will not be accounted for in the challenge results
rules.spin_feature: Only purchased and won features will be taken into account for the challenge
rules.spin: Any spin (incl. extra buys) counts in the challenge
rules.limit_on: Spins: {value} per player to get the highest multiplier. You'll be notified when your spins are done
rules.one_participant: If there's only one participant, the challenge is canceled, and fees are refunded
rules.fewer_participant: If participants are fewer than prize spots, the challenge is canceled, and fees are refunded
rules.prizes_distribution: Prizes are awarded to active players by max multiplier, others by join order
rules.closed_after_start: For challenges where joining is closed after the start: the participant count is checked at the start of the challenge
rules.opened_after_start: For challenges where joining is allowed after the start: the participant count is checked when prizes are distributed
rules.limit_participants: Only a limited number of participants can join the challenge

cancelled.title: This challenge was cancelled due to insufficient number of participants
cancelled.subtitle: Try your luck in other challenges

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.no_data: No players participating at the moment

p2p.title: Create challenge
p2p.about_limit: You can enable either the Spin limit or the Min bet limit at the same time
p2p.can_join: Players can join after the challenge started
p2p.not_join: Players can not join after the challenge started
p2p.agreements_debited: I confirm that I'm creating a challenge with a participation fee of {value}, which will be debited from my balance when I hit “CREATE CHALLENGE”
p2p.agreements_debited_pool: I confirm that I'm creating a challenge with a prize pool of {value}, which will be debited from my balance when I hit “CREATE CHALLENGE”
p2p.agreements_cant_edit: The challenge can't be edited or cancelled once it's created
p2p.challenge_deposit_prize_create: Deposit prize pool and create challenge
p2p.form_leave_warning: By leaving this form you'll lose all data you've filled in
p2p.invite_more: Invite more people to compete and have fun!
p2p.invite_code_first_part: Invite more people and share the join code
p2p.cant_join_challenge_subtitle: This challenge allows to join new participants only before it started.

friends.title: “Friends party”
friends.option_organizer: You join the challenge as a participant
friends.option_participant: Everyone, including you, pays an entry fee
friends.option_prize_pool: The prize pool is the sum of all entry fees

influencer.title: “Influencer's party”
influencer.option_prize_pool: The prize pool is paid from your balance

tooltip.mode: Choose the type of challenge you want to create. Based on your selection, the relevant fields to fill out will appear below.
tooltip.type: Choose the type of challenge you want to create. Depending on your selection, the system will apply different rules for generating the challenge leaderboard.
tooltip.image: Select an image from the provided list to be displayed on your challenge card for all participants.
tooltip.games: Select one or more games from the list provided where your challenge will be active.
tooltip.fee: Specify the fee amount in EUR that will be deducted from participants' balances. This amount will be used to form the challenge prize pool and will be converted at the exchange rate at the time of payment.
tooltip.privacy: Choose the type of challenge. Access to a private challenge is only available via an invite code and payment of the entry fee. In public challenges, players can join by paying the entry fee.
tooltip.joining_code: Generate or enter a unique joining code that players can use to join your private challenge.
tooltip.start: Specify the start date and time of the challenge based on your device. Each participant will see the start time in their local time zone.
tooltip.end: Specify the end date and time of the challenge based on your device. Each participant will see the end time in their local time zone.
tooltip.spin_limit: Specify the limit on the number of spins that will be counted for each participant in the challenge.
tooltip.min_bet: Specify the minimum bet amount in EUR for which a player's bet will be counted in the challenge.
tooltip.paid_features_condition: Choose the condition for spin participation in the challenge: Any Spin Allowed: All spins and purchased bonuses of the player are allowed.  Only Bought Features: Only the player's purchased bonuses are allowed.  Bought Features Excluded: Purchased bonuses of the player do not participate in the challenge.
tooltip.prizes_distribution: Specify the number of prize positions and the distribution of the prize pool in percentages between them. The percentages should be listed from highest to lowest, and their total must equal 100%.
tooltip.prizes_distribution_money: Specify the number of prize positions and the distribution of the prize pool in EUR. The amounts should be listed from highest to lowest, and the entire prize pool cannot be awarded to just one winner.
tooltip.joining_rules: Choose the rule for player participation in the challenge.
tooltip.multiplier: Specify the number of highest multipliers that will be considered when summing the bets.

feature_conditions.header: Choose the condition for spin participation in the challenge:
feature_conditions.allowed_description: All spins and purchased bonuses of the player are allowed.
feature_conditions.bought_description: Only the player's purchased bonuses are allowed.
feature_conditions.bought_excluded_description: Purchased bonuses of the player do not participate in the challenge.

error.min_bet: The minimum bet must be at least {value}
error.max_bet: The maximum bet cannot exceed {value} (considering currency conversion)
error.organizer_participating: Can't create the challenge: the organizer is already participating in one or more selected games
error.code_length: The code must be exactly {value} characters long
error.start_date_invalid: The start date cannot be later than the end date
error.start_date_too_soon: The challenge must start at least {value} minutes from now
error.min_bet_too_low: The minimum bet must be at least {value} (considering currency conversion)
error.max_bet_too_high: The maximum bet cannot exceed {value} (considering currency conversion)
error.prize_exceeds_previous: The prize for this place cannot exceed the previous place's reward
error.code_invalid: The code must contain only Latin letters and digits
error.response_subtitle_default: Please try again later or contact support
error.response_subtitle_206: Your payment couldn't be processed. Please check your balance or try again later
error.response_subtitle_100: You've already joined this challenge or another one with intersecting games.
error.min_bet_present: Can't be set when min bet is present
error.spin_limit_present: Can't be set when spin limit is present

games.empty_title: There are no games matching your request
games.empty_subtitle: Try to adjust filters and search request

privileges.next_empty: New rewards will be added soon

empty.sub_title: We'll let you know when there's any activity here
